word_mean: 室：小腔。如脑室，脑内若干小腔之一

sentence.Network_en: In the lizard, a muscular septum partially divides the ventricle.
sentence.Network_cn: 在虫蜴中, 肌肉质的隔膜把心室部分地隔开.

sentence.Network_en: The cardiovascular disorders interfere with the emptying of the left ventricle.
sentence.Network_cn: 心血管病人造成左心室郁血.

sentence.Network_en: From the left atrium the blood passes through the bicuspid valve into the right ventricle.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自左心房的血液通过二尖瓣进入右心室.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...或称盲沟（typhlosole），是增加吸收养料面积的结构。开始出现由静脉窦、一心房（atrium）和一心室（ventricle）组成的心脏。除无肾门静脉和总主静脉外，循环系统及血液循环方式均与文昌鱼十分相似。脑的各部分排列在同一.

...brachium of inferior colliculus）是一扁平短节，由下丘行向内侧膝状体。（三）第四脑室(fourth ventricle)第四脑室是位于延髓、脑桥和小脑之间的室腔，形似帐篷。第四脑室的底为菱形窝，顶朝向小脑，顶的前部由小脑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin ventriculus, diminutive of venter 'belly'

entry.def: A ventricle is a part of the heart that pumps blood to the arteries.

means.word_mean: 1. one of four connected cavities in the brain; is continuous with the central canal of the spinal cord and contains cerebrospinal fluid
2. a chamber of the heart that receives blood from an atrium and pumps it to the arteries
